definition.zh_def: 水仙花，一種春季開花的植物，通常有黃色或白色的花朵，屬於水仙科。
definition.en_def: A daffodil is a spring-flowering plant with a trumpet-shaped structure, typically yellow or white, belonging to the amaryllis family.
definition.example: The garden was filled with beautiful daffodils blooming in the spring sunshine.
